channel.title: CVE Feed for Simple Matted Thumbnails -- Simple Matted Thumbnails
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Simple Matted Thumbnails -- Simple Matted Thumbnails

item.title: CVE-2021-38339|2024-08-04T01:37:16.495Z -- simple%20matted%20thumbnails -- simple%20matted%20thumbnails
item.description: The Simple Matted Thumbnails WordPress plugin is vulnerable to Reflected Cross-Site Scripting due to a reflected $_SERVER["PHP_SELF"] value in the ~/simple-matted-thumbnail.php file which allows attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts, in versions up to and including 1.01.
